post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hello,
For anyone who is interested in Chicago opp...
I recommend this lady, Megan as a very professional recrutier taking care of Chicago IT openings.
--------------------------
Brendan:
It was a pleasure speaking to you last week.
Please save my contact information for your files, and please send me a word version of your resume so that I can update our system.
If you know of anybody interested in hearing about new IT opportunities in the Chicago Area, feel free to pass along my information.
Thanks so much, I look forward to hearing from you.
Megan Dwyer
Recruiter
312.841.7369 (Direct)
post.title: When looking at Chicago, US
